thread.title: Temperature in 8 cities of Odisha drops below 10 degrees, yellow warning to these cities
thread.title_full: Temperature in 8 cities of Odisha drops below 10 degrees, yellow warning to these cities

author: KalingaTV Bureau
title: Temperature in 8 cities of Odisha drops below 10 degrees, yellow warning to these cities
text:
Bhubaneswar: The temperature is dropping in Odisha and is expected to drop more. As a result, the day-to-day activities are disrupted. After the untimely rains in December, as an impact of the low-pressure over Bay of Bengal stopped, the chilliness of winter has risen. IMD has predicted that for the next one week, winter can be experienced. The temperature in 8 cities of Odisha have fallen below 10 degrees Celsius.
People are taking refuge in the warm bonfires. Along with the coldness, a thick blanket of fog can be seen. A yellow warning has been issued to Kandhamal, Angul and Dhenkanal for extreme cold.
Khurdha, Nayagarh, Ganjam, Gajapati, Keonjhar, Mayurbhanj, Sundargarh and Jajpur are likely to experience thick fog on Saturday predicted the Indian Meteorological Department (IMD).
